article_title: Melrose resident presents grant check to Windrush Farm
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: Melrose resident Larissa Shah, project management officer at MAXIMUS, awarded Windrush Farm a grant of $4,200 on May 6 on behalf of the MAXIMUS Foundation to directly fund the Giddy Up and Grow program for youth at risk. Shah visited Windrush Farm to personally present the check to Windrush Board Chair Bob Gore and Windrush Executive Director Mandy Hogan. Windrush Farm is a nonprofit organization in North Andover. Founded in 1964, Windrush provides equine-assisted activities and therapies to
